sys_script_include.name: ApplicationList

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_0f45588adb130010281270e23996196f
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_331786_proj_tt.ApplicationList</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>ApplicationList</name><script><![CDATA[var ApplicationList = Class.create();
ApplicationList.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
Application : function(){
		var sd=this.getParameter('sub');
		var applicationList= '';

  //Provide variable name ofTheme


      var gr = new GlideRecord('x_331786_proj_tt_faculty');   //Provide the table name which is getting referred in the Application field


      gr.addQuery('stream',sd);   //Provide field name of the table with which the the query will be executed


      gr.query();


    while(gr.next()) {


              if (applicationList.length > 0) {


                      //build a comma separated string of groups if there is more than one


                      applicationList+= (',' + gr.sys_id).toString();


              }


              else {


                      applicationList= gr.sys_id.toString();


              }


      }


      // return a list of card category available*/


      return 'sys_idIN' + applicationList;
},
    type: 'ApplicationList'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-03 07:05:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>0f45588adb130010281270e23996196f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ApplicationList</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Project-Time Table Management System" source="x_331786_proj_tt">1616c3eddb530010281270e2399619b4</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Project-Time Table Management System">1616c3eddb530010281270e2399619b4</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0f45588adb130010281270e23996196f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-03 07:25:44</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
